ðŸ“– Summary: KeyPass is an open-source, offline password manager built with Kotlin. It allows users to securely store, manage, and generate passwords without relying on internet connectivity. Key features include encrypted backups, dark mode support, Material Design 3, biometric authentication, TOTP, and import/export functionality.
